anna#paqtE&nna#sya nO dEhyanamIqvasya# SuqShmiNa#H | 
pra pra#dAqtAra#M tAriShaq Urja#M nO dhEhi dviqpadEq catu#ShpadE || 
udu# tvAq viSvE# dEqvA agnEq Bara#ntuq citti#BiH | 
sa nO# Bava Siqvata#maH suqpratI#kO viqBAva#suH || 
prEda#gnEq jyOti#ShmAn. yAhi SiqvEBi#raqrci#BiqstvaM | 
bRuqhadBi#-rBAqnuBiq-rBAsaqn mA hi(gm)#sI staqnuvA$ praqjAH || 
saqmidhAq&gniM du#vasyata GRuqtairbO#dhayaqtAtithi#M |
